mapper.select: SELECT pcode FROM (select pcode, input_date from product where id=#{ id }) ORDER BY input_date DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY

SELECT p.pcode, p.pname, p.context, p.img, p.price, p.img2, p.img3, p.img4, p.img5, p.input_date, p.deliver, p.status, p.saleok, p.loc, p.pcancel, p.c3code, p.id, c1.name as cname, c2.name as c2name, c3.name as c3name FROM product p, CATEGORY c1, CATEGORY2 c2, CATEGORY3 c3 WHERE c1.ccode=c2.ccode AND c2.c2code = c3.c2code AND c3.C3CODE=p.C3CODE AND p.PCODE=#{pcode}
